original.text:
The rest of the world is planning for 2030 climate action.

Scott Morrison wants to wait until 2050.

Delay is the new denial.
original.author: AdamBandt

rewritten:
The rest of the world is planning for 2030 climate action.

Scott Morrison wants to wait until 2050.

Delay is the new denouement.
